dct_title_s: Kaisei Nihon yochi rotei zenzu: zōshū teihon; Nagakubo Genju.; Preface title: Shinkoku Nihon yochi rotei zenzu
dct_description_sm: Shows administrative divisions (provinces, counties, capitals of fiefs), roads, historical places, and temples. Also shows distances between ports. Cover title. Originally engraved on wood block in An'ei 4 [i.e., 1775], with title: Shinkoku Nihon yochi rotei zenzu. Wood block print. Printed on Japanese paper. Oriented with north toward the upper right. Relief shown pictorially. Includes explanatory notes. 1 map: col.; on sheet 85 x 133 cm., folded in covers 29 x 17 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
